message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay around $60 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $120.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $120 is still more than I'm looking to spend. How about we settle at $70? That's a fair compromise.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I've already met you halfway. I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. I'm confident you'll find it worth it.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about $80? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but $80 is still below my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make at least $115 to be fair. I can offer it to you for $115.
